## Non-overlap

```{ojs}

NOMs = ["IRD","NAP","PAND","PEM","PND","Tau","Tau-BC","Tau-U"]

```

## Parametric

```{ojs}
//| panel: input

ES_parametric = ["LOR", "LRRd", "LRRi", "LRM", "PoGO", "SMD"]
viewof ES_index = Inputs.select(ES_parametric, {value: "LRRd", label: "Effect size index"})
```
